name: CoinPayments.net Payment Gateway for WooCommerce
author: CoinPayments.net

sections.description: This plugin implements a payment gateway for WooCommerce to let buyers pay with Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ripple, and other cryptocurrencies via CoinPayments.net.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the coinpayments-payment-gateway-for-woocommerce directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. In the WooCommerce Settings page go to the Payment Gateways tab, then click CoinPayments.net.
  4. Check “Enable CoinPayments.net” and enter your CoinPayments.net Merchant ID and IPN Secret (a long random string you define for security).
  5. Click “Save changes” and the gateway will be active.
